means: 说蠢话，胡说( blather的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He kept on blathering about police incompetence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喋喋不休地念叨着警察不称职。

list.abs: 心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... blastula 囊胚 blather 胡说 bleaching 漂白.
different parts of the brain control logic and speech , as anyone listening to an air head endlessly blather on realizes .大脑的不同部位控制着逻辑和讲话，因为任何一个人都听过笨蛋无休无止地讲废话。
9 see joke : a love blathers and do not love diligent young person , pestering big scientist Einstein all the day , want him to publish successful recipe .9看笑话：一个爱说废话而不爱用功的青年，整天缠着大科学家爱因斯坦，要他公开成功的秘诀。

RelatedPhrase.word: She blathers about goodness and beauty and her own genius

list.key: She blathers about goodness and beauty and her own genius
list.exp: 她胡吹什么德行、美貌和自己的天才
list.abs: 5. She blathers about goodness and beauty and her own genius她胡吹什么德行、美貌和自己的天才。  6. Oh , bene . then let ' s stop all this.

entry.tran: 喋喋不休；废话连篇；絮絮叨叨
entry.def: If someone is blathering on about something, they are talking for a long time about something that you consider boring or unimportant.

example.ex: The old men blather on and on...

auth_sentence.content: Now onto to the rest of your blathering.... Oh, wait not once did you attempt to answer the question.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now onto to the rest of your blathering.... Oh, wait not once did you attempt to answer the question.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now onto to the rest of your blathering.... Oh, wait not once did you attempt to answer the question.

auth_sentence.content: Contrary to the blathering of the author, there shouldn't be need to worry about "local" vintages, structures or wind conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Contrary to the blathering of the author, there shouldn't be need to worry about "local" vintages, structures or wind conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Contrary to the blathering of the author, there shouldn't be need to worry about "local" vintages, structures or wind conditions.

auth_sentence.content: When I run into a friend at the checkout, I find myself blathering about the contents of my trolley.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I run into a friend at the checkout, I find myself blathering about the contents of my trolley.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I run into a friend at the checkout, I find myself blathering about the contents of my trolley.
